text: "Chillin'" is a song by French house duo Modjo, written and performed by producer Romain Tranchart and vocalist Yann Destagnol. It features samples from the song "Le Freak" by Chic, for which Nile Rodgers and Bernard Edwards are also credited as songwriters. Although less successful than Modjo's previous single, "Lady (Hear Me Tonight)", the song managed to reach number three in Finland and Hungary, number four in Portugal and Spain, number 10 in Switzerland and number 12 in the United Kingdom. ==Track listings== Original release (2001) #"Chillin'" (Original Extended) #"Chillin'" (B H Q Revision- Derrick Carter Remix) #"Chillin'" (Modjo's Dyrt Remix) #"Chillin'" (Live) Revisited (2001) #"Chillin'" (Original Extended) #"Chillin' con Carne" (Por Favor Mix By We In Music vs. The Buffalo Bunch) #"Lady (Hear Me Tonight)" (Choo Choo's Original Recipe) ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== {|class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" !Chart (2000–2001) !Peak position |- |- |- |- |- |- !scope="row"|Europe (Eurochart Hot 100) |16 |- |- |- |- !scope="row"|Hungary (Mahasz) |3 |- |- !scope="row"|Ireland Dance (IRMA) |1 |- |- |- |- !scope="row"|Portugal (AFP) |4 |- |- |- |- |- |- |- !scope="row"|US Hot Dance Singles Sales (Billboard) |23 |} ===Year-end charts=== {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" !Chart (2001) !Position |- !scope="row"|Switzerland (Schweizer Hitparade) |93 |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:2001 singles Category:Modjo songs Category:Songs written by Nile Rodgers Category:Songs written by Bernard Edwards Category:2001 songs Category:MCA Records singles Category:House music songs
